The Nongnaimiao Luxin Coal Mine is an underground coal mine with a construction scale of 5 million tons per year

operators: Inner Mongolia Luxin Energy Development Company
web_search_companies.notes: The operator is a subsidiary of Shandong Energy, which holds a majority stake.
